entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
